title: China Inflation Rate MoM
description: The Consumer Price Index in China increased 0.10 percent in October of 2022 over the previous month. Inflation Rate MoM in China averaged 0.16 percent from 1996 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 2.60 percent in February of 2008 and a record low of -1.80 percent in June of 1998. Inflation Rate MoM measures month over month change in the price of goods and services. This page provides - China Inflation Rate MoM - actual values, historical data, forecast, chart, statistics, economic calendar and news.
author: National Bureau of Statistics of China
